data.name: ssCaption3

data.name: ssCaption5

data.name: StoreDescription
data.value:
MonkeyPaste is a clipboard manager, automation and productivity tool like no other. Enhancing your clipboard into an enriched and organized part of your workflow, featuring an intuitive and low - profile interface that supports text, files and images. Designed for flexibility, with an ever - growing community - driven libray of plugins.
It began as an experiment by a programmer wanting more than just copy and paste out of the clipboard. He wanted a simple command like Ctrl+C that would 'add to' instead of 'replace' what was on the clipboard. And the experiment worked. The little tool was very handy. This entrigued the programmer with more ideas and more experiments, that now has become "MonkeyPaste".
As the desktop is to your files, MonkeyPaste intends to be to your clipboard. Its a suite of tools carefully designed to seemlessly integrate and interoperate with any application or format of content. Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V are much more than just shortcuts. They are the ports of entry all applications share, carrying a wealth of value and meaning you deserve to have available at your fingertips. Not just thrown away after the next Ctrl+C.
I am that programmer mentioned earlier and I want everyone to be able to find use out of MonkeyPaste. So it and all of its features are completely free to use. I also want you to feel comfortable using it. So I assure you, as being the only force behind its creation, that NONE of the (very) personal information that can arise on your clipboard is ever tracked or stored ANYWHERE beyond your own machine. Period.

data.name: StoreFeature1
data.value: ● Simple and friendly interface with both horizontal/vertical layouts, list/grid view and multi - monitor support

data.name: StoreFeature10
data.value: ● Append mode: Copying becomes 'add to' instead of 'replace' on the clipboard. Both text and files, fully customizable

data.name: StoreFeature11
data.value: ● Sophisticated clip tracking, sources and usage with enhanced support for Firefox and Chromium - based browsers (Chrome, Edge, Brave)

data.name: StoreFeature12
data.value: ● Fully - featured clip editor with rich text (tables, lists, links, etc.) with find/replace and highlighting

data.name: StoreFeature13
data.value: ● Store your images in the secure database, ready to use as files anytime on - demand just drag - and - drop!

data.name: StoreFeature14
data.value: ● Powerful text templating for quick, dynamic pasting from your snippet collection

data.name: StoreFeature15
data.value: ● Trigger & Action designer for custom automations and action chaining

data.name: StoreFeature16
data.value: ● Simple to use and extend plugin system for both analyzing clips or read/write any format to your clipboard

data.name: StoreFeature17
data.value: ● Built - in plugin browser with an ever - growing community - driven library of plugins

data.name: StoreFeature18
data.value: ● Automate everything with plugin presets, stash and use your any of your AI prompts or commands with ease

data.name: StoreFeature19
data.value: ● More platforms and features coming soon! We're just gettings started 🎉

data.name: StoreFeature2
data.value: ● Both light & dark themes are completely dynamic, use any color you want

data.name: StoreFeature3
data.value: ● Integrated help & hints right in the interface. Online manual, videos and forum to get you started all on the website (monkeypaste.com/docs)

data.name: StoreFeature4
data.value: ● Optimized for performance and stressed tested with 1,000,000s of clips.

data.name: StoreFeature5
data.value: ● Anytime search, just start typing using both simple & advanced filtering on clips and their sources over dozens of fields

data.name: StoreFeature6
data.value: ● Organize your clips in tag trees and create resusable filters

data.name: StoreFeature7
data.value: ● Safe, secure and private local data storage (no data collection) always encrypted with optional 2 - factor password protection and easily block apps or websites from your tracker

data.name: StoreFeature8
data.value: ● Extensive drag - and - drop support, custom global shortcuts, routing and mouse - free navigation

data.name: StoreFeature9
data.value: ● Custom mouse modes: right - click paste and left - click auto - copy

data.name: StoreShortDescription
data.value: The clipboard is a jungle. MonkeyPaste is the KING! Swing from app to app, copying this and pasting that like never before with MonkeyPaste!! A brand - new, cutting edge clipboard and analytic automation tool!!!

data.name: TeaserCaption
data.value: Sample of MonkeyPaste in action!

data.value: Installed in this language. English is only for these examples
